hero.description: Passionate about building clean, fast, and usable interfaces. I love combining design and code to create web experiences that stand out.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Front-end Manager specialized in UI/UX with over 5 years of experience in web development, component system design, and technical leadership. Since 2023 I lead the frontend team at ATM Grupo Maggioli, where I direct the creation and evolution of IRIS, a corporate Design System based on Web Components with StencilJS that unifies the company's visual identity after the merger of three companies.
about.p2: IRIS is built on a monorepo managed with Lerna, published on NPM as an internal library, and offers a complete catalog of components, from fundamental pieces (buttons, icons, alerts) to complex interface solutions like dashboards, dynamic forms, or translation managers. Its architecture focuses on scalability, accessibility, performance, and modularity, becoming the transversal standard for new products.
about.p3: Additionally, I provide strategic support to other projects as a Scrum Master, promoting best practices in CI/CD, automation, Jira management, and agile methodologies, oriented towards continuous delivery and workflow improvement between teams.
about.p4: Previous full-stack development experience with Angular, JavaScript/TypeScript, SASS, Java/JSP, and SQL, allowing me to have a complete vision of the product cycle and communicate effectively with multidisciplinary profiles.
